question: Which country organized Operation Sadbhavana for National Integration?
explanation: The Indian Army has organized Operation Sadbhavana for National Integration. These operations are carried out by Indian Army in Jammu & Kashmir and North East states respectively. It has been organized on 21st of Sept. 2017. The Sadbhavana tour was organised by the 109 Infantry Brigade of the Indian Army. Its main aim is to develop trust among and reignite the minds of youth towards national integration.
